issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
I created a simple Hello World application. This refuses to launch in mobile web preview mode. The following is the error message

Unable to generate Mobile Web App. Error:

[INFO] Titanium Mobile Web Compiler v2.1.0.GA
[INFO] Compiling Mobile Web project "HelloWorld" [development]
[INFO] Copying /home/vinayak/.titanium/mobilesdk/linux/2.1.0.GA/mobileweb/themes...
[INFO] Copying /data1/Projects/HelloWorld/Resources...
[INFO] Copying /data1/Projects/HelloWorld/Resources/mobileweb...
[INFO] Copying /data1/Projects/HelloWorld/Resources/mobileweb/apple_startup_images/Default.jpg...
[INFO] Copying /data1/Projects/HelloWorld/Resources/mobileweb/apple_startup_images/Default-Portrait.jpg...
[INFO] Copying /data1/Projects/HelloWorld/Resources/mobileweb/apple_startup_images/Default-Landscape.jpg...
[INFO] Copying /home/vinayak/.titanium/mobilesdk/linux/2.1.0.GA/mobileweb/titanium...
[INFO] Scanning project for dependencies...m
[INFO] Searching for all required modules...
[INFO] Found 73 dependencies, 1 package, 110 modules
[INFO] Processing i18n strings...
[INFO] Assembling titanium.js...
[INFO] Processing splash screen...
[INFO] Assembling titanium.css...
[INFO] Generating app icons...
fields.summary: MobileWeb application doesn't launch preview in Browser

comments.body: Is it on web browser or browser on Android emulator?
Will re-open once a response has been received.
